Description:
Scaling New Heights Of Design & Luxury (VIRTUAL INSPECTION SATURDAY 26th of SEP @ 10:15AM
This sophisticated, new architect-designed town residence showcases a unique state-of-the-art design and excels for magnificent family living.
Delivering all the space and style you want in a luxury home, including a high standard of features and contemporary finishes, soaring high entry void, towering cathedral ceilings and outdoor living tailor-made for entertaining.
Be impressed by the monochromatic Bosch kitchen with plenty of storage and breakfast bench, and huge open-plan living/dining zone, seamlessly connected via sliding doors to a private landscaped deck and courtyard.
A second living room with built-in desk opens to a private outdoor deck, enhancing lifestyle flexibility and adds a further outdoor entertaining option.
On the upper-level you will be in awe of the hotel-style main bedroom, incorporating an extensive built-in robe and sublime twin ensuite, complemented by 3 additional robed bedrooms, fully-tiled bathroom of premium quality, intimate deck, study nook, powder room, heating/AC, alarm, single lock up garage and beautiful landscaped gardens.
Enjoy a coveted location, a short walk to GSAC, Centre Road shops, Bentleigh Train Station, quality schools, various bus routes and Centenary Park.
Insights: 151 other 4 bedroom house in Bentleigh East have recently been sold.

Description:
INSPECTION BY APPOINTMENT - PLEASE CONTACT AGENT TO ARRANGE A SUITABLE TIME.
ENTRY LEVEL EXCELLENCE IN A SENSATIONAL CARNEGIE LOCATION!
A brilliant opportunity for first home buyers, keen investors, and downsizers is ready to be seized with this sensational 2 bedroom unit which offers a stunning Carnegie location!
Well-presented to live in as is and with plenty of scope for stylish renovation, this single level abode promises quality timber floors, spacious lounge with gas fireplace, functional kitchen with sizeable area for meals, generous main bedroom, both bedrooms with BIRs, neat bathroom with separate toilet, laundry, north-facing courtyard and garden plus extra courtyard space at the rear, external blinds, single lock-up garage, and extra off-street parking.
Moments to Packer Park, Duncan Mackinnon Reserve, Koornang Park, Murrumbeena Park, vibrant Koornang Road shopping strip with great restaurants, local shops/cafes including the popular Left Field, Chadstone Shopping Centre, Carnegie Primary School, Glen Eira College, buses, and Murrumbeena Station.

Description:
A HIDDEN GEM!
WITH THE VICTORIAN GOVERNMENT'S ROADMAP TO RE-OPENING, STEP 2, CONTACTLESS, PRIVATE INSPECTIONS OF THIS PROPERTY CAN NOW BE CONDUCTED. A LIMIT OF ONE PERSON PER INSPECTION ACCOMPANIED BY ONE OTHER PERSON FROM AN EXISTING HOUSEHOLD OR IMTIMATE PARTNER AND THE PROSPECTIVE PURCHASER'S CHILREN UNDER 18 YEARS OF AGE. PLEASE CONTACT MICHAEL EGAN ON 0412 359 956.
Secure modern living abounds in this stylish and modern first floor apartment, perfect as your city hideaway or potential investment opportunity.
Offering gleaming porcelain tiling throughout, a large open plan living area with expansive stone bench top kitchen, two excellent bedrooms (master with vaulted ceiling), a dual access bathroom with floor to ceiling tiling, very functional laundry and a good sized balcony perfect for the odd BBQ and drink!
Features include reverse cycle air conditioning, secure intercom system, Blanco appliances, dishwasher and glass splash back, and secure car parking off the rear lane.
This is the perfect city hideaway OR the ideal investment opportunity. An inspection is SURE to impress!
Insights: 4/5-7 Clarence Street, Bentleigh East VIC 3165 was last sold in 2020 and 53 other 2 bedroom unit in Bentleigh East have recently been sold.

Description:
Designer Family Home With All the Modern Cons in centre of it all
INSPECTIONS BY APPOINTMENT - PLEASE CONTACT AGENT.
No expense has been spared in the design and construction of this striking 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom property. Walk through the front door into an inviting, functional and modern family home that ticks all the boxes. The highlights include two master bedrooms, a rumpus room, two powder rooms, seamless indoor/outdoor living and a study nook.
The open-plan kitchen/living/dining space is guaranteed to impress! The modern kitchen includes sleek cabinetry, a gorgeous wooden breakfast bar, premium stainless steel appliances and feature lighting. It's complimented by a spacious living and dining space, that leads through large sliding doors to a landscaped backyard; the perfect space for enjoying quality time with your nearest and dearest.
A floating timber staircase leads to the first floor where you'll find 3 bedrooms, a rumpus room, the family bathroom and a powder room. All bedrooms are inviting with carpeted floors and BIRS with one master featuring an additional WIR for extra storage. The bathrooms and powder rooms are stylish yet practical, all with high-end fittings and finishes.
Main features include:
Intelligent design that maximises the space
Family-friendly location
4 good sized bedrooms all with BIR's, 1 master with added WIR
2 master bedrooms with en suites
3 contemporary bathrooms, 2 powder rooms & separate laundry
Rumpus room for entertainment
Wooden staircase leading to first floor
Gorgeous timber floors throughout
Study nook
Central heating & feature lighting
Single garage with internal access
Situated in an established pocket of Bentleigh East, adjacent to Coatesville Primary School, with all the amenities you need within close vicinity, the location of this property couldn't get any better. Hop onto the M1 or the train at Bentleigh Station for an easy commute to Melbourne.
If premium living is what you're looking for then this gorgeous home is for you. Don't miss this incredible opportunity, book an inspection with our team today!
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions in the content and photos are approximate only.

Description:
Modern luxury in prime position
Capturing an enviable location & lifestyle, youll be instantly impressed with this brand-new street fronted townhouse complete with luxurious appointments & high-end finishes. Engineered oak floors flow seamlessly from the entry throughout the light filled downstairs domain comprising an open plan living & dining zone where fabulous indoor-outdoor living comes to the fore, with doors out to an alfresco patio & lushly landscaped front garden setting. Further complemented by the crisp clean lines of a gourmet stone kitchen with Bosch stainless steel appliances (including two ovens & an integrated dishwasher), an abundance of soft close cabinetry & waterfall edge breakfast bar while a laundry & a stylish powder room completes the ground level. Upstairs delivers a multi purpose landing retreat, a main bedroom with fabulous green aspect, luxe ensuite & walk-in robe, while two further bedrooms both with expansive built-in robes share a stunning central bathroom with freestanding bath, shower & floor to ceiling tiles. Other features include security alarm & cameras, single auto garage with additional off-street parking for a second car, substantial storage throughout, heating/air conditioning, cassette split system units upstairs, & perfectly located close to schools, local cafes, shopping strips, parklands & transport.
Insights: 1/47 Almond Street, Caulfield South VIC 3162 was last sold in 2020 and 43 other 3 bedroom house in Caulfield South have recently been sold.

Description:
Contemporary Design, Great Family Space!
Capturing a superb Bayside location, this wonderful family home gives you space, security and style you want with luxury features throughout. Be greeted by stunning facade as you make your way into the home. Step inside onto elegant Bamboo flooring and 3.1m high ceilings and a large spacious living zone opening out to a large outdoor entertaining area with easy-care landscaped gardens. Serve up a feast in the stunning Caesar stone-topped kitchen with oversized Bosch appliances and Blum soft-closing draws.
With the convenience of bedrooms situated on the top floor discover the spacious master suite with ensuite & large walk-in robe as well as two more double bedrooms with built-in robes a luxurious family bathroom with a bathtub. As you head outside you will feel a sense of privacy with your own westerly covered deck spilling out into the lush hedged garden perfect for low maintenance family entertaining plus a beautiful balcony from the master ensuite.
With additional benefits including split system heating and cooling in each room plus a bigger than standard double remote garage plus additional off-street parking, this excellent family home. is just moments from the famous Oasis bakery, GESAC & all the sporting facilities, playgrounds, great shopping, cafes and restaurants on Centre Road and just 2kms to fabulous Chadstone Shopping Centre. Plus, its just a short walk too McKinnon Secondary College. Situated within only 14kms to Melbourne CBD and 7kms to some of Melbournes best beaches, this is one not be missed.
Insights: First listed on 22 September, this house has been on Domain for 28 days (last updated on 22 September). 215 other 3 bedroom house in Bentleigh East have recently been sold.

Description:
A rare find in a tightly held position
A highly sought architectural style, fabulous location & excellently zoned living spaces create a splendid combination in a flexible residence fit for any sized family. Natural light throughout begins in the generous entry & extensive open plan living & dining where large picture windows frame elegant manicured gardens. A seamlessly flow of entertaining possibilities continues with the casual living/meals & separate family room served by a contemporary kitchen with granite benches & stainless-steel appliances all extending to the rear garden oasis with a glorious hotel-style pool & tropical surrounds. Four double bedrooms include the ambient main bedroom with walk-in & built-in wardrobes, a super stylish ensuite & a main bathroom with a bath concluding with a fitted study. Dotted with stunning retro features such as parquetry floors, a secure entrance, ducted heating, an air conditioner, large laundry, powder room, double carport & irrigation system for the low maintenance gardens are just the start in an excellent family home in the Caulfield South Primary School zone, moments to Princes park, local shops & cafes & fantastic family amenities.

Description:
Multi level stylish living
A stunning statement of style, this as new multi level architect designed townhouse finished to absolute perfection, offers an enviable low maintenance lifestyle, showcasing exemplary finishes & luxury throughout. Offering the best of both worlds - peaceful & private in a boutique block of just five with all the action of vibrant Centre road literally metres from your door. On entry, the ground level features a generously proportioned bedroom with built in robes & stunning dual access ensuite. Retreat upstairs to the expansive first level where quality timber floors flow seamlessly throughout open plan living & dining domain with floor-to-ceiling windows that lure the natural light (complete with electric blinds) creating a fantastic indoor-outdoor interplay out to a private full width, north-facing entertainers balcony all further complemented by a state of the art gourmet stone kitchen with high end stainless appliances (including two ovens/dishwashers) & an abundance of beautifully crafted soft close cupboards, while an additional bedroom with built-in robes, stylish powder room & Euro laundry complete the first level. The upper level features a luxurious main bedroom with built-in robes, balcony access & luxe ensuite, an additional bedroom with built-in robe & a sparkling bathroom. Other features include secure entry with automatic front gates, double carport with storage cage, split system heating/cooling units throughout & all ideally located in a fantastic lifestyle location with an abundance of shops, restaurants & cafes as well as schools, transport & parklands all close by.
Insights: 4/77 Robert Street, Bentleigh VIC 3204 was last sold in 2016 and 79 other 4 bedroom house in Bentleigh have recently been sold.

Description:
A Sun Filled 4 Bedroom Surprise
Want something that's accommodating, spacious, light filled and easy? This modern neutral 4 bedroom + study/rumpus 2.5 bathroom street front freestanding town residence is renovated and extended to create a versatile haven that has as much of an accent on family living as it does on outdoor entertaining. Welcomed by a private lawned garden with an elevated entertaining deck, this casual contemporary retreat features a versatile study/2nd living area with loads of storage and a built in workstation; generous living area flowing to a north facing dining area with bi-fold doors to the sun drenched rear deck; a fabulous entertainer's kitchen with a movable island, 2 pantries, 900mm 6-burner Kleenmaid stove, Miele dishwasher, a; fully fitted laundry; and a downstairs bedroom (BIRs) serviced by a stylish bathroom. Upstairs there is a beautifully big main bedroom retreat with fitted WIR & designer double shower ensuite with bath, 2 double bedrooms (BIRs) and a powder room. The rear deck extends your living space in fuss-free style and has access to the lock up garage (via a shared drive). Complete with polished boards, ducted heating downstairs, split system air conditioning to all rooms, a shed and a secure 2nd car space at the front, there's plenty to offer a busy family who are always on the go, wanting low maintenance living with easy-use space. A lovely family location, around the corner from Tucker Road Primary School, Holmesglen College, and hospital, cafes, the Chadstone bus;, and a brand new playground just doors away.

Description:
Family Sized Luxury
Click through the photos for the 3D Tour
Due to the current circumstances with COVID-19 it is important that prior to showing prospective buyers through a property that the following criteria are met.
Drive past the property and make sure that you are happy with the location and the property externally.
Viewed the listing online particularly the photos, floorplan and video (where applicable)
You are an unconditional buyer and in a position to enter into any negotiations to purchase the property (should you wish to buy it).
You DONT display any symptoms relating to the COVID-19 Coronavirus outbreak.
You HAVE NOT travelled overseas in the past 14 days.
Youre not experiencing ANY FLU LIKE SYMPTOMS.
These criteria are now in place to protect homeowners, tenants, buyers and staff and must strictly be adhered to in this very difficult time for all.
Created with inspired architectural finesse matched by exceptionally high standards of craftmanship and painstaking attention to detail, this spectacular house-sized town residence built by renowned luxury builder Vujic Property Group, elevates the concept of family-sized contemporary sophistication to enthralling brand-new heights.
The superbly proportioned masterful design is introduced by a soaring void with striking chandelier and flows past a sublime downstairs main ensuite bedroom and fully fitted study to a vast living and dining room seamlessly connecting via sliding stacker doors to a sun-saturated north-facing entertaining deck and surrounding gardens with plenty of room for the kids to play and the family dog to run free.
Worthy of a master chef, the centrepiece culinary kitchen is unlike anything you have seen before with a Pitt cooktop where the burners seemingly float above the Porcelain benchtops, an induction cooktop, two ovens, two sinks, two European dishwashers, an extra-large integrated fridge and freezer and a waterfall-edge central island/breakfast bar to display your gourmet feasts.
The upper level offers a superb arrangement of a second living zone, a sumptuous main ensuite bedroom, two more bedrooms and a family bathroom.
Along with the advantage of a double garage behind no-maintenance aluminium wood-like battens, this remarkable approximately 35-square residence also features a glamorous powder room with teardrop basin, large laundry, zoned ducted heating and refrigerated air conditioning, thermally broken double-glazed aluminium windows, Engineered Oak flooring, plush carpets, central vacuuming, Quantum Quartz bathroom benchtops, freestanding elliptical soak tubs in each upstairs bathroom, walk-in robes in all four bedrooms, fireplace in living room, side courtyard to enjoy a morning coffee, cavernous under-stair storage, hallway cupboards and bespoke joinery throughout.
Commanding an impressive street presence on approximately 365sqm of land, its close to Princes Park, city-bound trams, local shops and cafÃ©s, Gardenvale and Elsternwick Stations, schools and Elsternwick and Glenhuntly Villages.

Upstairs Master (his+ hers wir/bir + bath ensuite) and Downstairs master (wir + ensuite)

Fully integrated + zoned heating/cooling (no ugly cassettes on the wall)
